name: Command and Control - Socket Filters (T1205.002)
description: Detects suspicious use of custom socket filters or packet inspection logic indicative of traffic signaling or hidden C2 trigger patterns.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(iptables OR nft OR bpftool OR tcpdump OR socat) AND process.args:(*bpf* OR *filter* OR *raw* OR *socket*)
